page.title: 17Gymnastics Club
page.content: Gymnastics is a popular sport for both girls and boys. I go to a gym club and our leotard is green and blue. Some people start gym at only 3 years of age and you can continue until you are about 25. At Wembley the medals are big but at clubs they are small. The floor mats are very soft so you don't hurt yourself on hard things.The vault is difficult and you need a lot of spring to do it properly. In competitions you are normally nervous and a bit worried in case you fall off. The boys vault differently from the girls. In gym training you have to do press-ups, sit-ups, squat-thrusts and other things.On the bar you do other things. Gym is a good sport.
